document.full_text: german chancellor angela merkel on saturday affirmed her high opinion of french finance minister christine lagarde, tipped as a candidate to be the next head of the international monetary fund.
document.title: germany again mentions lagarde as possible imf head
lines_and_colors: german chancellor angela merkel on saturday affirmed her high opinion of french finance minister christine lagarde, tipped as a candidate to be the next head of the international monetary fund.
